    • onGenerateReportButton

      public void onGenerateReportButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      Generate report button based on the selected report. The first report generates data for the selected contact. The second report shows appointments by type and month. The third report shows the number of appointments by country.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Select the radio button for the report and click on the "Generate Report" button.
      Throws:
      SQLException
      IOException
